name: part_006
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・夜公演】SorAZ Major Debut Live『First Gravity』【 #SorAZGravity 】【ホロライブ ⧸ ときのそら ⧸ AZKi 】 [7oFSKRxKu7A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Promotional montage for Tokino Sora's new album and SorAZ's debut album.
List of donors who sent gifts to the event (Eruma project) scrolling on screen.
Promotional montage for AZKi's solo EPs and covers.
Second loop of promotional montage for Tokino Sora.

subtitles.original: 2024年3月6日(水) Release Mini Album STAR STAR*T リリース決定！
subtitles.english: March 6, 2024 (Wed) Release: Mini Album STAR STAR*T confirmed!

subtitles.original: いつも何かを伝えるように歌ってる
subtitles.english: I'm singing as if to always convey something

subtitles.original: 飲み込んだ思い 青い空に飛ばせ
subtitles.english: Let the swallowed thoughts fly into the blue sky

subtitles.original: 歌ってみた『可愛くてごめん』 配信中！
subtitles.english: Cover of 'Kawaii kute Gomen' now streaming!

subtitles.original: 繋がるメロディ 流れる星に変わってく
subtitles.english: The connecting melody turns into a shooting star

subtitles.original: SorAZ メジャーデビューアルバム Futurity Step 配信中！
subtitles.english: SorAZ Major Debut Album 'Futurity Step' now streaming!

subtitles.original: 君のために歌うよ 君に届くようにと
subtitles.english: I'll sing for you, so that it reaches you

subtitles.original: SorAZ Major Debut Live "First Gravity" CD物販限定特典
subtitles.english: Major Debut Live 'First Gravity' CD merchandise exclusive benefits

subtitles.original: 輝きは世界中を超えて
subtitles.english: The radiance transcends the whole world

subtitles.original: エルタマ お引出し差し入れ企画 参加者様一覧
subtitles.english: List of participants in the Eruma gift delivery project

subtitles.original: 差し入れを贈ってくださったそらまめの皆様、本当にありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: To all the Soramames who sent gifts, thank you so much!

subtitles.original: 確かにここで重ね合えた鼓動
subtitles.english: The heartbeats that certainly overlapped here

subtitles.original: 触れ合う音が光になって降り注ぐ
subtitles.english: The touching sounds turn into light and pour down

subtitles.original: この一瞬が永遠だと
subtitles.english: That this moment is eternal

subtitles.original: 煌めいては色づいていく
subtitles.english: Sparkling and gaining color

subtitles.original: AZKi メジャーデビュー EP『3枚目の地図』好評配信中！
subtitles.english: AZKi Major Debut EP '3-maime no Chizu' now streaming!

subtitles.original: 君と描いた世界 君と描く
subtitles.english: The world I drew with you, drawing with you

subtitles.original: 音が飛び立つ
subtitles.english: The sounds take flight

subtitles.original: AZKi『トウキョウ・シャンディ・ランデヴ』(Cover) 配信中！
subtitles.english: AZKi 'Tokyo Shandy Rendezvous' (Cover) now streaming!

subtitles.original: 切なき心の窓
subtitles.english: The window of my painful heart

subtitles.original: AZKi『Sincerely』(Cover) 配信中！
subtitles.english: AZKi 'Sincerely' (Cover) now streaming!

subtitles.original: 2024年3月6日(水) Release Mini Album STAR STAR*T リリース決定！
subtitles.english: March 6, 2024 (Wed) Release: Mini Album STAR STAR*T confirmed!
